name: Chubby Runners
description:
This game is developed for the mobile course of the master's degree in Computer Game Development in Verona's University, using Unity and C#. The game was developed as a team of 4 people.

The game is a Side Scrolling Endless Runner, the goal is to advance through the different scenarios while staying alive as long as possible. In each game, the player randomly controls the different characters available, each character has his own peculiarity and his own scenario. During the race, the different scenarios gradually increase their speed to make traversal difficult. In addition, among the different scenarios, it is possible to find as many as three power ups that allow you to recover your life, become invincible for a few moments and slow down your speed.

Developers: Giuseppe Abagnale, Andrea Masciulli, Giovanni Meazza, Alessandro Pegoraro
